text: Intersex UK is an organisation by and for intersex people (those born with differences of sex development or variations of sex anatomy) in the United Kingdom and Ireland. Intersex UK works to protect the bodily autonomy and civil rights of intersex children, adolescents, and their families through government lobbying and educational outreach.Woman's Hour, BBC Radio 4 == References == Category:LGBT organisations in the United Kingdom Category:Intersex
title: Intersex UK
